Krišjānis Veinbahs

Loading the beard…

I’m a latvian student studying at Riga State Gymnasium No. 3. I’m interested in physics, programming and music. I sing in a choir, walk with shorts in winter and quite often like to get jiggy with it. I have gained some of my awesome programming skills by working at Scandiweb as a web developer on LashAffair and have explored physics by being a frequent at Junior Physics Academy.

When not doing very important bussiness stuff, I creatively express myself on such social platforms as Instagram and Twitter, attend weekly bike rides, play volleyball and much more!
